# Authentication UI Design Specifications

**Generated by**: frontend-design sub-agent
**Date**: 2026-02-19

## Design Foundation

**Spatial System**: 8px base unit. All spacing uses multiples: 8, 16, 24, 32, 48, 64px.

**Typography Scale**:
- Display heading (app name): 28px / font-weight 700 / tracking-tight
- Screen heading (e.g., "Welcome back"): 24px / font-weight 600
- Body: 14px / font-weight 400 / line-height 1.5
- Caption/helper text: 12px / font-weight 400 / text-muted-foreground
- Labels: 14px / font-weight 500

**Color Tokens**:
- Background: `hsl(var(--background))`
- Card surface: `hsl(var(--card))`
- Primary brand: `hsl(var(--primary))`
- Destructive/error: `hsl(var(--destructive))`
- Muted text: `hsl(var(--muted-foreground))`
- Border: `hsl(var(--border))`

**Motion Principles**: 150ms ease-out for micro-interactions (field focus, button hover). 200ms ease-in-out for state transitions (loading spinner in, error message slide-down).

---

## Shared Layout Architecture: Split Screen Container

### Desktop Layout (min-width: 1024px)

50/50 split at full viewport height.

**Left Column - Branding Panel**:
- Background: `hsl(var(--primary))` solid fill
- Content centered vertically and horizontally (flex column, gap-8)
- Content stack:
  1. App icon: 48x48px rounded-xl, white bg at 10% opacity, `BookOpen` or `Sparkles` Lucide icon in white, 28px
  2. App name: "Product Consultant Helper" - white, 28px, font-weight 700, max-width 280px, text-center
  3. Tagline: "Create compelling content that converts." - white at 80% opacity, 16px
  4. Separator: 1px rule at 20% white opacity, 64px wide, centered
  5. Feature callouts (3 items): check icon (white, 16px) + text (white 80% opacity, 14px):
     - "AI-powered content research"
     - "Personalized writing style"
     - "Professional portfolio output"

**Right Column - Form Panel**:
- Background: `hsl(var(--background))`
- Content centered vertically and horizontally
- Form max-width: 400px
- Padding: 48px (32px on tablet)

### Mobile Layout (max-width: 1023px)

- Left panel becomes compact header: 80px tall, full-width, brand background, icon 28px + name 18px horizontally, both white
- Form: full-width, padding 24px horizontal, 32px vertical

### Tablet Layout (768px - 1023px)

- Same as mobile stacking, header 96px tall
- Form gets Card component with shadow-sm, centered with 24px margin

---

## Screen 1: Login

### Form Content Stack (gap-24px)

**Section A - Header**:
- "Welcome back" / 24px / font-weight 600
- "Sign in to your account" / 14px / text-muted-foreground
- Margin below: 32px

**Section B - Google Sign-In Button**:
- Full width, variant: `outline`, height: 44px
- Left icon: Google "G" SVG (actual multicolor mark, 20x20px)
- Label: "Continue with Google"
- Font weight: 500
- Hover: background shifts to `hsl(var(--muted))`

**Section C - Divider**: "or" text between two Separator components, 12px text-muted-foreground

**Section D - Fields**:
- Email: label "Email address", placeholder "you@company.com", leading `Mail` icon 16px, height 44px
- Password: label "Password" with "Forgot password?" link floated right (12px, text-primary)
  - Leading `Lock` icon, trailing eye toggle (`Eye`/`EyeOff`)
  - 16px gap between fields

**Section E - Sign In Button**: full-width, height 44px, variant default, "Sign in" / loading: spinner + "Signing in..."

**Section F - Sign Up Link**: "Don't have an account? Sign up" (text-primary, font-weight 500)

### States
- **Error (Invalid Credentials)**: Destructive Alert between divider and email, both fields get red border. Message: "Invalid email or password. Please try again."
- **Error (Empty Fields)**: Individual field errors below each empty field
- **Loading**: Spinner button, fields readOnly, Google button disabled

---

## Screen 2: Signup

### Form Content Stack

**Header**: "Create your account" / "Start creating better content today"

**Google button**: Same as Login, label "Continue with Google"

**Fields**:
- Email: identical to Login
- Password: same as Login but no "Forgot password?" link
  - **Strength indicator** below input (visible only when non-empty):
    - Bar: full-width, 4px height, rounded, fills 33%/66%/100%
    - Colors: Weak = red (`hsl(var(--destructive))`), Fair = amber (`hsl(24, 100%, 50%)`), Strong = green (`hsl(142, 76%, 36%)`)
    - Label: "Weak"/"Fair"/"Strong" right of bar, 12px, color matches
    - Requirements checklist: `Check` (green) or `X` (muted) per item:
      - "At least 8 characters"
      - "At least 1 uppercase letter"
      - "At least 1 number"
- Confirm Password: eye toggle, validates on blur
  - Match: "Passwords match" text in green below
  - No match: "Passwords do not match" in destructive, red border

**Create Account button**: full-width, 44px, disabled when passwords don't match or fields empty

**Terms**: 12px centered, links to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

**Sign In Link**: "Already have an account? Sign in"

---

## Screen 3: Email Confirmation

**Layout**: No split panel. Centered card on `--background`.

**Card**: max-width 480px, padding 40px 48px, rounded-xl, shadow-lg

**Content** (text-center):
1. Icon circle: 80px, bg-primary/10, `Mail` icon 36px in primary color
2. Heading: "Check your email" / 22px / font-weight 600
3. Body: "We sent a confirmation link to:" + email in bold
4. Resend button: full-width, outline, height 44px, `RefreshCw` icon
   - Cooldown: 60s timer, disabled, label "Resend in 0:57", `Clock` icon
5. Separator
6. Back link: "Back to sign in" with `ArrowLeft` icon
7. Note: "Didn't receive it? Check your spam folder." / 12px

### States
- Resend success: toast "Confirmation email sent"
- Resend error: destructive toast, button re-enables immediately

---

## Screen 4: Password Reset

### State A: Request Form

- Back link: "Back to sign in" at top
- Heading: "Reset your password"
- Subheading: "Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link"
- Email field (identical to Login)
- "Send reset link" button: full-width, 44px, loading: "Sending..."
- Bottom link: "Remember your password? Sign in"

### State B: Success

Cross-fade transition (200ms) to:
- Icon circle: 80px, bg-green-500/10, `CheckCircle2` 36px in green
- "Check your email" heading
- "We sent a password reset link to [email]"
- "The link expires in 24 hours." / 12px
- "Back to sign in" button: full-width, 44px

**Security**: Always show success state regardless of whether email exists (prevents enumeration).

---

## Responsive Breakpoint Summary

| Screen | Mobile (< 768px) | Tablet (768-1023px) | Desktop (>= 1024px) |
|---|---|---|---|
| Login | Stacked, compact header | Stacked, card with shadow | 50/50 split |
| Signup | Stacked, scrollable | Stacked, card with shadow | 50/50 split |
| Email Confirmation | Full-width card, 24px margins | Centered card, max-width 480px | Centered card, max-width 480px |
| Password Reset | Stacked, compact header | Stacked, card with shadow | 50/50 split |

## Theme Notes

- Left branding panel keeps `hsl(var(--primary))` in both themes
- Google G SVG stays multicolor in dark mode (per Google brand guidelines)
- Password strength colors are hardcoded (semantic traffic-light colors, not theme-dependent)
